rules_text:
When Sootfoot Spelunker enters the battlefield, excavate. [i](Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a land card, put a colorless artifact token named Loot onto the battlefield. It has ‘Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.')[/i]
Sacrifice a Loot token: Put a +1/+1 counter on Sootfoot Spelunker.
